Posts.Content: Jul 25, 2008 02:38AM gina070805 wrote: Greetings,  I have a question!  Since having an Axilliary Node Disection, my arm, back, hip and foot on that side has not been the same.  They tell me it's because the nodes they took out were from all three layers of nodes and that the top layer of nodes affects the nerves.  Shortly after the 35 Rad treatments, the swelling started.  There are days when my arm will completely draw up and it it's some incredibly painful.  Does anyone have any experience with this?  Does exercise help?  Does exercise hurt?  Please, I'm up for comments. Thank You,
Posts.Title: massaging upper back? meliaanne MinAZ
